Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are trying to communicate with each other over a distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone device as the method of communication.
The student can represent how sound travels through the string from one student to the other.
The student can show the device is made from provided materials like cups and string.
The student can highlight the importance of the device in helping the students communicate over a distance.
The student can explain in their drawing how this technology affects people's communication.
